Package teacher

The teacher package includes a grade book which contains a collection of spreadsheets.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Gradebook A Gradebook is the overarching object of the grader.
Teacher A Teacher represents the main user of the gradebook.
TeacherAssistant Teacher Assistant object.
 

Package teacher Description

The teacher package includes a grade book which contains a collection of spreadsheets. The operations regarding the grade book are specified in 2.2. Those spreadsheets are accessable by the objects created from Teacher and TeacherAssistant classes.
